title: 'Queen of Rock 'n' Roll' Tina Turner dies
description: Tina Turner - one of rock's great vocalists and most charismatic performers - has died aged 83.

title: Onlookers in town synonymous with Madeleine McCann case hoping search will finally bring answers
description: On a muddy peninsula on the Arade reservoir we watch police busily clearing a wooded area.

title: Russia accused of 'staging' pictures showing captured US-made vehicles in Belgorod
description: Russia has accused the west of "growing involvement" in the conflict with Ukraine after releasing pictures of western-made military vehicles it claims were used in a border incursion.

title: Paralysed man walks again thanks to 'digital bridge' that reconnects brain and spinal cord
description: A paralysed man has been able to walk again after communication was re-established between his brain and spinal cord using a wireless "digital bridge".

title: Paralysis breakthrough is quite astonishing - and AI is the key
Millions preparing to flee homes as volcano spews ash and rock
description: Millions of people in Mexico have been told to get ready to leave their homes as the country's Popocatépetl volcano spews ash, rock and gas.

title: Madeleine McCann police use sniffer dogs and rakes to comb wooded area during reservoir search
description: Police are using sniffer dogs and rakes to comb through a wooded area on the banks of a reservoir during the second day of an operation in Portugal as part of the investigation into Madeleine McCann's disappearance.

title: Madeleine McCann police use sniffer dogs to comb wooded area during reservoir search
description: Police are using sniffer dogs to comb through a wooded area on the banks of a reservoir during the second day of an operation in Portugal as part of the investigation into Madeleine McCann's disappearance.

title: Barring of Imran Khan's political party 'under consideration'
description: Imran Khan's political party could be barred with the decision "under consideration", a Pakistan minister has said - in a move that could deepen a tense stand-off between the former prime minister and the country's government and military.

title: Valencia football club to appeal against stand closure following racist abuse towards Vinicius Jr
description: Valencia have said they will appeal against their five-game partial stadium closure and fine following the racist abuse aimed at Real Madrid forward Vinicius Jr in Sunday's La Liga match.

title: Toddler finds gun in sofa and accidentally kills himself
description: A 2-year-old boy accidentally shot and killed himself after finding a gun in the sofa at the family's home in Michigan.

title: France bans short-haul flights
description: France has banned short-haul flights where people are able to get a train instead, in a bid to reduce carbon emissions.

title: 95-year-old woman dies a week after being tasered by police
description: A 95-year-old grandmother who was tasered by a police officer has died, Australian police have confirmed.

title: Teenager's killer identified almost 50 years after her murder
description: Police in Canada say they have identified the man who raped and murdered a 16-year-old girl in 1975.

title: Florida school bans poem read at Biden's inauguration as concerns increase about state's growing restrictions
description: A school in Florida has banned the poem read at Joe Biden's inauguration after a single complaint.
